remarks: A polarity is a closed projective subspace.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
polsubcl.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
polsubcl.p $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
polsubcl.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
polsubclN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X C_ A ) -> ( ._|_ ` X ) e. C ) $.
